volumeInfo.subtitle: a contemporary approach
volumeInfo.description: This textbook addresses the conceptual framework for mathematics taught in elementary school. The book is organized around numbers and arithmetic, encouraging prospective teachers to gain an understanding of the underlying concepts of elementary mathematics while maintaining an appropriate level of mathematical precision. Students will improve their mathematics knowledge and skills in numeration systems, integers, rationals, geometry, probability/statistics, and other selected topics.
volumeInfo.title: Mathematics for elementary teachers

searchInfo.textSnippet: When you truly understand mathematical concepts, it's like magic... This book was written to help you increase your mathematical knowledge and confidence, and appreciate the beauty and excitement of the mathematical world.
